Uses of Interface
org.klojang.jdbc.SQLSession

Packages that use SQLSession
Package
Description
org.klojang.jdbc
Database utilities aimed at providing a quick route for database data to be inserted into Klojang templates.

  • Uses of SQLSession in org.klojang.jdbc

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SQLSession
    SQL.session(Connection con)
    Returns a SQLSession that allows you to execute the SQL query.
    default SQLSession
    SQLSession.set(String varName, Object value)
    Sets the specified template variable to the specified value.
    default SQLSession
    SQLSession.setArray(String varName, int... values)
    Equivalent to setValue(varName, values).
    default SQLSession

    Equivalent to setValue(varName, values).
    default SQLSession
    SQLSession.setIdentifier(String varName, String identifier)
    Sets the specified template variable to the escaped and quoted version of the specified identifier (e.g. a column name or table name).
    default SQLSession
    SQLSession.setOrderBy(String sortColumn)
    Sets the sort column of the ORDER BY clause within a SQL template.
    default SQLSession
    SQLSession.setOrderBy(String sortColumn, boolean isDescending)
    Sets the sort column and sort order of the ORDER BY clause within a SQL template.
    default SQLSession

    Sets the specified template variable to the escaped and quoted version of the specified value.
    default <T> SQLSession
